entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:28 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 87 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023
